AppShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

AppDescription.message: Provides a way to quickly autofill (and manage) multiple Entrust authentication grids for sites utilizing Entrust Physical Form Factor Authentication

BrowserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

ManageGrid_Error_InvalidGridID.message: Failed to load grid from storage

ManageGrid_Message_GridCreated.message: Grid created successfully. You may now close this window or make additional changes.

ManageGrid_Message_GridUpdated.message: Grid updated successfully. You may now close this window or make additional changes.

ManageGrid_Prompt_ConfirmDeleteWithPlace.message: Are you sure you want to delete grid "$ID$"?

ManageGrid_Alert_GridDeleted.message: Grid successfully deleted. Click the OK button to close this window automatically.

Notifications_Message_InvalidGrid.message: The grid with ID "$ID" could not be found.

Notifications_Message_MissingChallenge.message: There was no challenge prompt found on the page.

Notifications_Message_ResponseError.message: A response could not be generated for the challenge: $CHALLENGE$

Notifications_HelpMessage.message: Please contact the extension author if this problem persists.

Options_SettingDescription_AutoSubmitFor.message: Enable to automatically submit the challenge form after entering the response

Options_SettingDescription_ForceDarkMode.message: Enable to force this extension to use dark mode (regardless of your system preferences)

Options_BugEnhancement_QuestionText.message: Found a bug? Have an idea for an enhancement?

Options_BugEnhancement_LinkText.message: Please submit an issue on the GitHub repository
